title: Extra: Ken Burns | People I (Mostly) Admire
description: The documentary filmmaker, known for The Civil War, Jazz, and Baseball, turns his attention to the Holocaust, and asks what we can learn from the evils of the past.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
